website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Designo Curved MX34VQ is a 34-inch gaming monitor with a steep curve and some nice features, including a wireless charging base, gamer-friendly settings, and a powerful audio system.

customer_reviews.title: Happy for a year now
customer_reviews.text: I've been really satisfied with this purchase for a more than a year now, the screen is really mind-blowing for anyone not used to this kind of quality. The sound, in particular, is very well designed and I surprised myself playing FPS without the need for a gaming headset. The wireless charging feature is not a fast one for my Samsung Galaxy S9 but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Leophir

customer_reviews.title: Illegal plug
customer_reviews.text: Can't use the monitor as it was supplied with continental type two plus for Europe which is illegal to be sold in the UK (where I am right now). These goods need to comply with British Standards. If I cut the plug off and install a UK plug I invalidate the warranty. I need it urgently but let down badly. Amazon need to get their act together. Amazon site says "UK power supply". It is not.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ian C. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Thin stylish display with decent sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this monitor. Initially the sound didn’t seem very impressive but it was to do with the volume control located on the monitor itself at the rear. Overall great picture quality and easy on the eyes. Good large display and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Muarrif

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Superb Image quality for Photo processing on this 2560x1440 Monitor , my first monitor without DVI cable But DP connection so much easier, Real quality feel and look, NO Dead Pixels Full Marks to Asus, Sound quality is best i have had on Built in speakers , Almost knocked a star off because no height adjustment, but can't its to good def deserves 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Jonboy

customer_reviews.title: Great screen even if you're not a gamer.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my Predator screen which had failed. I'm a website developer and use the massive width to have multiple browser windows open. Gives crisp display. Charges phone. Backlighting doesn't disturb view. Occassionally takes switching inputs to get signal back. It doesn't have any smart screen functions ie you can't cast to it which is ok but would be a good feature upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dadd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I am more than happy with this ASUS monitor. Ultra-wide experience is brilliant. Built-in speakers are very good, better than expected. Monitor does look very nice on your desk and has that premium feel to it. Also 100Hz refresh rate makes things that much smoother. I do not play games on it, but even experience in Windows 10 is much better than 60Hz. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: PeteZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was so confused which monitor to buy as there are so many. I thought 34 inch might be too big but now I am used to it and it feels just right. I love being able to throw my mobile on the stand to charge it. Good picture and controls are easy to understand. I would buy this again. No issues running games in full 21:9 ratio. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Andy King

customer_reviews.title: Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get a proper monitor instead of using TV for my computer. It does everything I want And there are lots of adjustments available should I need them. Loud speakers not very loud so have to use head phones but I am partially deaf and have no problems with volume on my TV.
customer_reviews.author: paul emms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant, crisp colours along with a fabulous style to watch, this monitor is truly a delight. Colours are accurate and viewing angles perfect. Contrast levels & brightness are excellent for an IPS panel. Easy to assemble. Was up and ready within five minutes. It does really look the part. Highly recommend this monitor for all round purposes. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: paired with a gtx 1080ti it is just amazing! great colors for va panel
customer_reviews.text: paired with a gtx 1080ti it is just amazing! great colors for va panel, great 100hz, awesome wireless charger, i highly recommend it instead of the overpriced g-sync ones. with a good graphics card there is actually 0 tearing and v-sync works perfectly if needed (i never use it)! not to say that g-sync increases latency.
customer_reviews.author: socratis

customer_reviews.title: Monitor review
customer_reviews.text: It's quite affordable 3k monitor, easy to use with great picture quality and okay sound, it sounds like cheap 10 dollars speakers, but it's always better than nothing
customer_reviews.author: J1 xCs20

customer_reviews.title: First thing. It did not work out of box
customer_reviews.text: Did not work when first switched on. Only dim screen. No booting up. No connection with pc. Nothing. Also note: very annoying when pressing the function buttons. No labels printed on screen at all. Buttons flimsy and wobbly. Not happy. Currently returned and awaiting refund.
customer_reviews.author: bobcat

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTED, DON’T BUY IT ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: Monitor seems perfect but after few hours strange vertical lines appear on the screen, you have to shut down every time to avoid this. Simply annoying for a 4k expensive monitor. It’s a common issue but they don’t care, the still re-send the defected monitora to other customers until 1 decide to accept it anyway . Terrible, shipping to amazon again hopefully with a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Asd
customer_reviews.text: Great display . Freesync is unusable . Blinking in every title u start with freesync on .Changed 3 videocards . 19.1 drivers are even worse. Coming from an aoc tn 144hz picture quality is good 100hz is ok but i can sense the difference. Sound is good i do not use speakers beside those . Lack of VESA can be a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Monitor and Great Sounds
customer_reviews.text: I have bought it for my son 19 years and he is enjoying a lot. Harmon Kardon speakers are amazing. Picture quality is fantastic. Can't ask for more. Good buy. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The hovering monitor !!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor it is very stylish and has very beautiful colors. The monitor look like it is hovering on its stand as you wont see its arm while seating down so very smart shape style. Settings are very good to make the picture more clear and vivid. Text is clear as it is QHD monitor. Gaming is good for RTS games but for FPS 144Hz is little better. So overall excellent monitor for both work and entertainment
customer_reviews.author: PCGeek

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: Great looking clear screen for gaming and music software, the only downside is having to go into the menu to change the volume otherwise I'd give 5 stars. Just some extra buttons on the underside would make the world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice display
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the box looking like it had been stored in someone's she'd for 6 months, and the small amount of dirt in the box, the item is superb. Recommended display with a nice build quality and good looks.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Massive!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great just be prepared to buy the best graphics card money can buy as it’s kicked my gtx 970 sli to the curb!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor. Good quality of plastics. Excellent quality of the display. All expected functions. Looks nice. 25'' is a really comfortable size and 2k resolution is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor all I can say, requires a bit of work calibrating, but works perfect, great sound too.
customer_reviews.author: PsMaster

customer_reviews.title: Great montior but a real shame that my first order ...
customer_reviews.text: Great montior but a real shame that my first order had two suck pixels and my second had a dead pixel right in the middle. Very distracting and will be returning. You expect more for £300.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: very good looking, excellent picture quality and decent sound quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb monitor, very good looking, excellent picture quality and decent sound quality and volume from the built-in speakers. The eyecare features are very useful and makes for a very restful experience with no eye strain.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Arrived but had dead pixels in middle of screen so ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived but had dead pixels in middle of screen so i returned and went for dell ultra sharp 25inch 1440p wich was cheaper any way
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Exception price, the blue filter filter is useful if working late to protect your eyes, and aesthetically the screen looks very elegant and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Very very good monitor, 100 hz refresh rate and very high ...
customer_reviews.text: Very very good monitor , 100 hz refresh rate and very high quality screen witj 3440 x 1440 resolution , no tearing , good colors , good sound powered by harman/ kardon :)
customer_reviews.author: emil

customer_reviews.title: Good for Macs
customer_reviews.text: 4K is so cool. This screen works well with the new Mac Pro and is very responsive. Sound output reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Really good pixel quality and very sleek to look at
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Really good pixel quality and very sleek to look at.
customer_reviews.author: AbbeMc

customer_reviews.title: Great screen - shame about the cables
customer_reviews.text: Screen and settings are great. Shame that Amazon sent this U.K. address an EU power cable for the mains. Luckily had a spare one so used that but would have been an inconvenience to send it back just for the cable. Seems I'm not the first to have had this issue from reading other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J

customer_reviews.title: Good for gaming and working
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. Great panel. Very good response time. The only problem I had was that the wireless charging base would interfere with the HDMI cable, but once I realised this was the problem and moved the cable away it has served me very well.
customer_reviews.author: mini_otis

customer_reviews.title: Looks incredible on pc but absolutely HORRIBLE on consoles due to stretching the image without the ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks incredible on pc but absolutely HORRIBLE on consoles due to stretching the image without the option for black bars on either side
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! At first I got a broken screen but Asus exchange it realy quikly. It is realy high-quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor. Only problem wireless charging is useless
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Monitor. Only problem wireless charging is useless,works only when monitor is on and need place phone perfectly to make it charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Panel but...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to use this for the wireless charger be aware it affects the screen connections. While using it, personally it shows a "no signal" while the device is charging.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Ward

product_meta.title: ASUS Designo Curved MX34VQ 34 Inch UWQHD (3440 x 1440) Monitor, VA , Harman Kardon Speakers, Qi Wireless Charging, Flicker Free, Low Blue Light, TUV Certified
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Harman Kardon 8W| Size Name:34 Inch UWQHDASUS MX34VQ Designo Curved 34-inch UWQHD (3440 x 1440) 100Hz Freesync Monitor, VA, Harmon Kardon Speakers, Qi Wireless Charging, Flicker Free, Low Blue Light, TUV Certified - Dark Grey. UK Power Supply.

BOX CONTAINS
MX34VQ Monitor Power cord Power adapter DisplayPort cable Quick start guide Acrylic LED light covers HDMI cable Warranty Card
feature_bullets: 34-inch UWQHD display with 178 Degree wide-view angle in frameless Designo for edge-to-edge brilliance
8-Watts stereo speakers featured with Harman Kardon Audio and ASUS Sonic Master technologies
Featuring HDMI and DP ports for multi device connections
Qi Wireless Charger (5W/1A) Designed in the base with aurora lighting on while charging Qi-enabled devices
TUV Rhineland Certification for Flicker-free and Low Blue Light technology to ensure a comfortable viewing experience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars187 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
